data.actual_result: Nothing happens besides an error thrown in the console
data.expected_result: You're taken in the server's Overview panel
data.short_description: Configure option on Discord automated welcome messages doesn't work anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable New Member Messages in a server you have Manage Server permission in - Have a new user join - Click the three dots to bring up the message context menu on the automated message - Click the "Configure" option and observe how nothing happens
